title: On Campus Internships
content: Can a EEE student sit for on-campus CS internships, if yes then what are the min. CGPA cutoffs.

comments.body:
\> It depends on the company, placement office has no say in eligibility; so if the company feels EEE is skilled enough for the CSE job, then yes..

\> The cutoffs are also company based. College puts a cutoff of 6+ or 6.5+ to be eligible for placements. This changes every year!
